page.title: 05SURNAMES
page.content: WE DID A SURVEY OF SURNAMES IN BRIDGE END.WE COMPARED THEM WITH SURNAMES IN HAMNAVOE.INKSTER IS THE MOST POPULAR SURNAME IN BRIDGE END,FOLLOWED BY CHRISTIE THEN SMITH.IN HAMNAVOE POTTINGER IS THE MOST POPULAR THEN LAURENSON,AND FULLERTON,GOODLAD AND INKSTER ARE THIRD EQUAL. MOST OF THE PEOPLE WHO HAVE THE SAME SURNAME ARE STILL CLOSELY RELATED AND TEND TO LIVE IN ONE PART OF THE ISLAND.PEOPLE ARE BEGINNING TO MOVE FROM ONE PART TO THE OTHER NOW.SINCE THE BRIDGE CAME FAMILIES HAVE MOVED IN FROM OUTSIDE BURRA OR OUTSIDE SHETLAND AND THERE MAY BE ONLY ONE FAMILY WITH THAT SURNAME.SOMETIMES PEOPLE MOVE IN WITH THE SAME SURNAME AS PEOPLE ALREADY THERE.THERE ARE SEVERAL SMITHS WHO ARE NOT RELATED TO OTHER SMITHS IN BURRA.
